DOC.brief_summary: There is an association between intracranial arterial stenosis and ischemic stroke in young adults. The aim of this study is to evaluate the prevalence of intracranial arterial stenosis in asymptomatic regular resin of cannabis users in comparison with control subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Intracranial Arterial Stenosis and Resin of Cannabis Use
DOC.criteria: regular resin of cannabis users taking vasoactive medications taking other illicit drugs
